gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 120, Mavericks 116
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeated the Mavericks, 120-116. Tobias Harris led the way for the 76ers with 28 points (3-6 3pt. FG) and five rebounds, while Tyrese Maxey added 24 points and three assists in the victory. Luka Doncic tallied 38 points, 11 rebounds, and 10 assists for the Mavericks in the losing effort, his 13th triple-double of the season and 69th of his career. The 76ers have won back-to-back games as they improve to 35-25 on the season, while the Mavericks fall to 34-27.
